Class ChangeConsoleCommand

java.lang.Object
task04.ChangeItemCommand
task04.ChangeConsoleCommand
All Implemented Interfaces:
Command, ConsoleCommand
public class ChangeConsoleCommand extends ChangeItemCommand implements ConsoleCommand
The ChangeConsoleCommand class extends ChangeItemCommand and implements the ConsoleCommand interface. It represents a command to change the values of CalculationData items within a ViewResult by generating a random number for each item and updating its value. This command is executed when the user selects the corresponding key ('c') in the menu.

    • execute

      public void execute()
      Executes the command by changing the CalculationData items within the ViewResult using the ChangeItemCommand. Each item in the view is updated with a new random number, and then the updated view is displayed.
      Specified by:
      execute in interface Command
      Overrides:
      execute in class ChangeItemCommand
